code: import React from'react';import{Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);const PM25ComparisonChart=()=>{const data={labels:['宁波（2023）','全国平均','WHO 推荐'],datasets:[{data:[24,32,10],backgroundColor:['#e6374e','#999','#4caf50'],borderColor:'#111'}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.section,{initial:{opacity:0,x:100},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0},transition:{duration:0.9},viewport:{once:true},style:{maxWidth:600,margin:'2rem auto',textAlign:'center',color:'#ccc'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"PM2.5 \u5E74\u5747\u6D53\u5EA6\u5BF9\u6BD4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data})]});};export default PM25ComparisonChart;
